page.description: Position to the row requested (Note: Backward movement is not supported by all databases).
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = GoToRow(RowIndex as N)

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: SQL::ResultSet
argument.description: A SQL::ResultSet object created with a DIM statement.

page.discussion: The GoToRow() method positions to the row in a SQL::ResultSet. Note : Some databases do not support backward positioning.
page.example: dim conn as SQL::Connection dim rs as SQL::ResultSet dim connString as C dim select_exp as C connString = "{A5API='Access', FileName='c:\program files\a5v8\mdbfiles\alphasports.mdb'}" select_exp = "select Lastname from customer where bill_state_region = 'ma'" if .not. conn.open(connString) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if if .not. conn.execute(select_exp) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) conn.close() end end if rs = conn.ResultSet if .not. rs.GoToRow(2) then ui_msg_box("Error", rs.callresult.text) end if conn.close()
